name: The Cosmic Web
description:
A game I made for the Mini Jam.

You play as a little spaceship as you do things in an empty universe.

As of right now this game only has one mission and four areas to explore.

I will 100% build on this world and game as time goes on.

Control with WASD or arrow keys, click to interact with your environment, and press V to return to the Cosmic Web
